rows.label: qst201507_msg0001
rows.name: It's really quiet. Maybe no one's home?

rows.label: qst201507_msg0003
rows.name:
And they've been there the whole
time I was monitoring.

rows.label: qst201507_msg0005
rows.name:
What the plan? We charge in, take bad
man by surprise?

rows.label: qst201507_msg0006
rows.name:
Smash door wide open with special
missile attack from Hana?

rows.label: qst201507_msg0007
rows.name:
Whoa whoa, hold on! We don't want
to go and blow the place sky high!

rows.label: qst201507_msg0008
rows.name:
No missiles? Aww. Hana was looking
forward to big explosive entrance...

rows.label: qst201507_msg0009
rows.name:
As I recall, there should be a Nopon
cleaning lady on duty. She'll know
what's going on inside.

rows.label: qst201507_msg0010
rows.name:
So it's just a matter of asking this
Nopon cleaner then. Great, let's go
and find her!

rows.label: qst201507_msg0011
rows.name:
She only comes out early in the
morning. That will be our chance
to get a hold of her.

rows.label: qst201507_msg0012
rows.name:
Wow. Azami know everything.
Maybe too much everything...

rows.label: qst201507_msg0013
rows.name:
Oh, there's plenty of things I don't
know. I only learn by watching from
the shadows...
